mapper.sql: id,parent_id,contract_name,contract_type,status,share_space,chain_code, region_code,join_time,DATE_FORMAT(join_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as join_time_str,start_date,DATE_FORMAT(start_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as start_date_str, end_date,DATE_FORMAT(end_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as end_date_str,xiaowei_code,create_code, create_name,create_time,org_code,org_name,org_type,group_id
mapper.select:
select
from z_contracts where contract_type !='10' and parent_id = #{id}

select
from z_contracts where contract_type ='10' and status = '1' and group_id is null

select
from z_contracts where contract_type ='10' and group_id = #{groupId}

SELECT zc.`contract_name` AS contractName, zc.`org_code` AS nodeCode, zc.`org_name` AS nodeName, cf.`factor_name` AS targetName, cf.`factor_value` AS targetValue, cf.`factor_unit` AS targetUnit, rp.`title` AS planTitle, rpd.`content` AS planContent FROM z_contracts zc JOIN z_contracts_factor cf ON cf.`contract_id` = zc.`id` LEFT JOIN z_reserve_plan rp ON rp.`parent_id` = zc.`id` JOIN z_reserve_plan_detail rpd ON rpd.`parent_id` = rp.id where zc.parent_id = #{contractId}
